title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Military Bases in South Lebanon: An Inside Look at the Operation”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked military buildings and terror infrastructures of the terror organization Hezbollah in several areas in South Lebanon, a terrorist cell was attacked in the region of Aiyeita a-Shaab

Fighter jets attacked a short while ago military buildings and terror infrastructures of the terror organization Hezbollah in the areas of Al-Taybeh, Beit Lif, Zadikin, and Khirbat Selm.

Earlier, fighter jets attacked a military infrastructure and an aircraft attacked a terrorist cell that was identified in the area of Aiyeita a-Shaab. During the day, several other terror infrastructures in the area were attacked.

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/48rXHvS
